Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Sox-35th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Sox-35th due to a sick customer.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Sox-35th station due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested from Sox-35th to Roosevelt to provide connecting service in both directions.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
